00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ProblemSetList;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK);
00019 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00020 
00021 =head1 NAME
00022 
00023 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ProblemSetList - Entry point for Set-specific
00024 data editing/viewing
00025 
00026 =cut
00027 
00028 =for comment
00029 
00030 What do we want to be able to do here?
00031 
00032 filter sort edit publish import create delete
00033 
00034 Filter what sets are shown:
00035     - none, all, selected
00036     - matching set_id, visible to students, hidden from students
00037 
00038 Sort sets by:
00039     - set name
00040     - open date
00041     - due date
00042     - answer date
00043     - header files
00044     - visibility to students    
00045     
00046 Switch from view mode to edit mode:
00047     - showing visible sets
00048     - showing selected sets
00049 Switch from edit mode to view and save changes
00050 Switch from edit mode to view and abandon changes
00051 
00052 Make sets visible to or hidden from students:
00053     - all, selected
00054 
00055 Import sets:
00056     - replace:
00057         - any users
00058         - visible users
00059         - selected users
00060         - no users
00061     - add:
00062         - any users
00063         - no users
00064 
00065 Score sets:
00066     - all
00067     - visible
00068     - selected
00069 
00070 Create a set with a given name
00071 
00072 Delete sets:
00073     - visible
00074     - selected
00075 
00076 =cut
00077

00079 #   make one $mode variable that contains a string like "edit", "view", or "export"
00080

00247 sub pre_header_initialize {
00248     my ($self) = @_;
00249     my $r      = $self->r;
00250     my $db     = $r->db;
00251     my $ce     = $r->ce;
00252     my $authz  = $r->authz;
00253     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00254     my $user   = $r->param('user');
00255     my $courseName = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00256 
00257 
00258     # Check permissions
00259     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00260     
00261     if (defined $r->param("action") and $r->param("action") eq "score" and $authz->hasPermissions($user, "score_sets")) {
00262         my $scope = $r->param("action.score.scope");
00263         my @setsToScore = ();
00264     
00265         if ($scope eq "none") { 
00266             return "No sets selected for scoring.";
00267         } elsif ($scope eq "all") {
00268             @setsToScore = @{ $r->param("allSetIDs") };
00269         } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
00270             @setsToScore = @{ $r->param("visibleSetIDs") };
00271         } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00272             @setsToScore = $r->param("selected_sets");
00273         }
00274 
00275         my $uri = $self->systemLink( $urlpath->newFromModule('WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Scoring', $r, courseID=>$courseName),
00276                         params=>{
00277                             scoreSelected=>"ScoreSelected",
00278                             selectedSet=>\@setsToScore,
00279 #                           recordSingleSetScores=>''
00280                         }
00281         );
00282 
00283         $self->reply_with_redirect($uri);
00284     }
00285 
00286 }
00287 
00288 sub initialize {
00289 
00290     my ($self)       = @_;
00291     my $r            = $self->r;
00292     my $urlpath      = $r->urlpath;
00293     my $db           = $r->db;
00294     my $ce           = $r->ce;
00295     my $authz        = $r->authz;   
00296     my $courseName   = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00297     my $setID        = $urlpath->arg("setID");       
00298     my $user         = $r->param('user');
00299     
00300 
00301     my $root = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00302 
00303     # templates for getting field names
00304     my $setTemplate = $self->{setTemplate} = $db->newGlobalSet;
00305     
00306     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")
00307         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00308     
00309     ########## set initial values for state fields
00310     
00311     my @allSetIDs = $db->listGlobalSets;
00312     # DBFIXME count would suffice here :P
00313     my @users = $db->listUsers;
00314     $self->{allSetIDs} = \@allSetIDs;
00315     $self->{totalUsers} = scalar @users;
00316     
00317     if (defined $r->param("visible_sets")) {
00318         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [ $r->param("visible_sets") ];
00319     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_visible_sets")) {
00320         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [];
00321     } else {
00322         if (@allSetIDs > HIDE_SETS_THRESHOLD) {
00323             $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [];
00324         } else {
00325             $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [ @allSetIDs ];
00326         }
00327     }
00328     
00329     $self->{prevVisibleSetIDs} = $self->{visibleSetIDs};
00330     
00331     if (defined $r->param("selected_sets")) {
00332         $self->{selectedSetIDs} = [ $r->param("selected_sets") ];
00333     } else {
00334         $self->{selectedSetIDs} = [];
00335     }
00336     
00337     $self->{editMode} = $r->param("editMode") || 0;
00338     
00339     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to modify homework sets."))
00340         if $self->{editMode} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_problem_sets");
00341     
00342     $self->{exportMode} = $r->param("exportMode") || 0;
00343 
00344     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to modify set definition files."))
00345         if $self->{exportMode} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_set_def_files");
00346     
00347     $self->{primarySortField} = $r->param("primarySortField") || "due_date";
00348     $self->{secondarySortField} = $r->param("secondarySortField") || "open_date";
00349     
00350     
00351     #########################################
00352     # collect date information from sets
00353     #########################################
00354 
00355     my @allSets = $db->getGlobalSets(@allSetIDs);
00356 
00357     my (%open_dates, %due_dates, %answer_dates);
00358     foreach my $Set (@allSets) {
00359         push @{$open_dates{defined $Set->open_date ? $Set->open_date : ""}}, $Set->set_id;
00360         push @{$due_dates{defined $Set->due_date ? $Set->due_date : ""}}, $Set->set_id;
00361         push @{$answer_dates{defined $Set->answer_date ? $Set->answer_date : ""}}, $Set->set_id;
00362     }
00363     $self->{open_dates} = \%open_dates;
00364     $self->{due_dates} = \%due_dates;
00365     $self->{answer_dates} = \%answer_dates;
00366     
00367     #########################################
00368     #  call action handler  
00369     #########################################
00370     
00371     my $actionID = $r->param("action");
00372     $self->{actionID} = $actionID;
00373     if ($actionID) {
00374         unless (grep { $_ eq $actionID } @{ VIEW_FORMS() }, @{ EDIT_FORMS() }, @{ EXPORT_FORMS() }) {
00375             die "Action $actionID not found";
00376         }
00377         # Check permissions
00378         if (not FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID} or $authz->hasPermissions($user, FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID})) {
00379             my $actionHandler = "${actionID}_handler";
00380             my %genericParams;
00381             foreach my $param (qw(selected_sets)) {
00382                 $genericParams{$param} = [ $r->param($param) ];
00383             }
00384             my %actionParams = $self->getActionParams($actionID);
00385             my %tableParams = $self->getTableParams();
00386             $self->addmessage( CGI::div({class=>"Message"}, "Results of last action performed: "));
00387             $self->addmessage(
00388                                  $self->$actionHandler(\%genericParams, \%actionParams, \%tableParams), 
00389                                  CGI::hr()
00390             );
00391         } else {
00392             return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to perform this action."));
00393         }
00394         
00395         
00396 
00397     } else {
00398     
00399         $self->addgoodmessage("Please select action to be performed.");
00400     }
00401         
00402 
00403 }
00404 
00405 sub body {
00406     my ($self)       = @_;
00407     my $r            = $self->r;
00408     my $urlpath      = $r->urlpath;
00409     my $db           = $r->db;
00410     my $ce           = $r->ce;
00411     my $authz        = $r->authz;   
00412     my $courseName   = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00413     my $setID        = $urlpath->arg("setID");       
00414     my $user         = $r->param('user');
00415     
00416     my $root = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00417 
00418     # templates for getting field names
00419     my $setTemplate = $self->{setTemplate} = $db->newGlobalSet;
00420     
00421     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")
00422         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00423     
00424     # This table can be consulted when display-ready forms of field names are needed.
00425     my %prettyFieldNames = map { $_ => $_ } 
00426         $setTemplate->FIELDS();
00427     
00428     @prettyFieldNames{qw(
00429         select
00430         problems
00431         users
00432         filename
00433         set_id
00434         set_header
00435         hardcopy_header
00436         open_date
00437         due_date
00438         answer_date
00439         visible
00440         enable_reduced_scoring  
00441     )} = (
00442         "Select",
00443         "Edit<br> Problems",
00444         "Edit<br> Assigned Users",
00445         "Set Definition Filename",
00446         "Edit<br> Set Data", 
00447         "Set Header", 
00448         "Hardcopy Header", 
00449         "Open Date", 
00450         "Due Date", 
00451         "Answer Date", 
00452         "Visible",
00453         "Reduced Credit<br> Enabled" 
00454     );
00455     
00456 
00457 
00458     my $actionID = $self->{actionID};
00459     
00460     ########## retrieve possibly changed values for member fields
00461     
00462     my @allSetIDs = @{ $self->{allSetIDs} }; # do we need this one? YES, deleting or importing a set will change this.
00463     my @visibleSetIDs = @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} };
00464     my @prevVisibleSetIDs = @{ $self->{prevVisibleSetIDs} };
00465     my @selectedSetIDs = @{ $self->{selectedSetIDs} };
00466     my $editMode = $self->{editMode};
00467     my $exportMode = $self->{exportMode};
00468     my $primarySortField = $self->{primarySortField};
00469     my $secondarySortField = $self->{secondarySortField};
00470     
00471     #warn "visibleSetIDs=@visibleSetIDs\n";
00472     #warn "prevVisibleSetIDs=@prevVisibleSetIDs\n";
00473     #warn "selectedSetIDs=@selectedSetIDs\n";
00474     #warn "editMode=$editMode\n";
00475     #warn "exportMode = $exportMode\n";
00476     
00477     ########## get required users
00478         
00479     # DBFIXME use an iterator
00480     my @Sets = grep { defined $_ } @visibleSetIDs ? $db->getGlobalSets(@visibleSetIDs) : ();
00481     
00482     # presort users
00483     my %sortSubs = %{ SORT_SUBS() };
00484     my $primarySortSub = $sortSubs{$primarySortField};
00485     my $secondarySortSub = $sortSubs{$secondarySortField};  
00486     
00487     # don't forget to sort in opposite order of importance
00488     if ($secondarySortField eq "set_id") {
00489         @Sets = sortByName("set_id", @Sets);
00490     } else {
00491         @Sets = sort $secondarySortSub @Sets;
00492     }
00493 
00494     if ($primarySortField eq "set_id") {
00495         @Sets = sortByName("set_id", @Sets);
00496     } else {
00497         @Sets = sort $primarySortSub @Sets;
00498     }
00499 
00500     ########## print beginning of form
00501     
00502     print CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action=>$self->systemLink($urlpath,authen=>0), name=>"problemsetlist"});
00503     print $self->hidden_authen_fields();
00504     
00505     ########## print state data
00506     
00507     print "\n<!-- state data here -->\n";
00508     
00509     if (@visibleSetIDs) {
00510         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"visible_sets", -value=>\@visibleSetIDs);
00511     } else {
00512         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"no_visible_sets", -value=>"1");
00513     }
00514     
00515     if (@prevVisibleSetIDs) {
00516         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"prev_visible_sets", -value=>\@prevVisibleSetIDs);
00517     } else {
00518         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"no_prev_visible_sets", -value=>"1");
00519     }
00520     
00521     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"editMode", -value=>$editMode);
00522     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"exportMode", -value=>$exportMode);
00523     
00524     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"primarySortField", -value=>$primarySortField);
00525     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"secondarySortField", -value=>$secondarySortField);    
00526     
00527     print "\n<!-- state data here -->\n";
00528     
00529     ########## print action forms
00530     
00531     print CGI::p(CGI::b("Any changes made below will be reflected in the set for ALL students.")) if $editMode;
00532 
00533     print CGI::start_table({});
00534     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({-colspan=>2}, "Select an action to perform:"));
00535 
00536     my @formsToShow;
00537     if ($editMode) {
00538         @formsToShow = @{ EDIT_FORMS() };
00539     } else {
00540         @formsToShow = @{ VIEW_FORMS() };
00541     }
00542     
00543     if ($exportMode) {
00544         @formsToShow = @{ EXPORT_FORMS() };
00545     }
00546     
00547     my $i = 0;
00548     foreach my $actionID (@formsToShow) {
00549         # Check permissions
00550         next if FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID});
00551         my $actionForm = "${actionID}_form";
00552         my $onChange = "document.problemsetlist.action[$i].checked=true";
00553         my %actionParams = $self->getActionParams($actionID);
00554         
00555         print CGI::Tr({-valign=>"top"},
00556             CGI::td({}, CGI::input({-type=>"radio", -name=>"action", -value=>$actionID})),
00557             CGI::td({}, $self->$actionForm($onChange, %actionParams))
00558         );
00559         
00560         $i++;
00561     }
00562     
00563     my $selectAll =CGI::input({-type=>'button', -name=>'check_all', -value=>'Select all sets',
00564            onClick => "for (i in document.problemsetlist.elements)  { 
00565                            if (document.problemsetlist.elements[i].name =='selected_sets') { 
00566                                document.problemsetlist.elements[i].checked = true
00567                            }
00568                         }" });
00569     my $selectNone =CGI::input({-type=>'button', -name=>'check_none', -value=>'Unselect all sets',
00570            onClick => "for (i in document.problemsetlist.elements)  { 
00571                            if (document.problemsetlist.elements[i].name =='selected_sets') { 
00572                               document.problemsetlist.elements[i].checked = false
00573                            }
00574                         }" });
00575     unless ($editMode or $exportMode) {
00576         print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({ colspan=>2, -align=>"center"},
00577             $selectAll." ". $selectNone
00578             )
00579         );
00580     }
00581     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({-colspan=>2, -align=>"center"},
00582         CGI::submit(-value=>"Take Action!"))
00583     );
00584     print CGI::end_table();
00585     
00586     ########## print table
00587     
00588     ########## first adjust heading if in editMode
00589     $prettyFieldNames{set_id} = "Edit All <br> Set Data" if $editMode;
00590     $prettyFieldNames{enable_reduced_scoring} = 'Enable Reduced<br>Credit' if $editMode;
00591     
00592     
00593     print CGI::p({},"Showing ", scalar @visibleSetIDs, " out of ", scalar @allSetIDs, " sets.");
00594     
00595     $self->printTableHTML(\@Sets, \%prettyFieldNames,
00596         editMode => $editMode,
00597         exportMode => $exportMode,
00598         selectedSetIDs => \@selectedSetIDs,
00599     );
00600     
00601     
00602     ########## print end of form
00603     
00604     print CGI::end_form();
00605 
00606     return "";
00607 }
00608 
00609 ################################################################################
00610 # extract particular params and put them in a hash (values are ARRAYREFs!)
00611 ################################################################################
00612 
00613 sub getActionParams {
00614     my ($self, $actionID) = @_;
00615     my $r = $self->{r};
00616     
00617     my %actionParams;
00618     foreach my $param ($r->param) {
00619         next unless $param =~ m/^action\.$actionID\./;
00620         $actionParams{$param} = [ $r->param($param) ];
00621     }
00622     return %actionParams;
00623 }
00624 
00625 sub getTableParams {
00626     my ($self) = @_;
00627     my $r = $self->{r};
00628     
00629     my %tableParams;
00630     foreach my $param ($r->param) {
00631         next unless $param =~ m/^(?:set)\./;
00632         $tableParams{$param} = [ $r->param($param) ];
00633     }
00634     return %tableParams;
00635 }
00636 
00637 ################################################################################
00638 # actions and action triggers
00639 ################################################################################
00640 
00641 # filter, edit, cancelEdit, and saveEdit should stay with the display module and
00642 # not be real "actions". that way, all actions are shown in view mode and no
00643 # actions are shown in edit mode.

00702 # this action handler modifies the "visibleUserIDs" field based on the contents
00703 # of the "action.filter.scope" parameter and the "selected_users" 
00704 sub filter_handler {
00705     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
00706     
00707     my $r = $self->r ;
00708     my $db = $r->db;
00709     
00710     my $result;
00711     
00712     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.filter.scope"}->[0];
00713     if ($scope eq "all") {
00714         $result = "showing all sets";
00715         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $self->{allSetIDs};
00716     } elsif ($scope eq "none") {
00717         $result = "showing no sets";
00718         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [];
00719     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00720         $result = "showing selected sets";
00721         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $genericParams->{selected_sets}; # an arrayref
00722     } elsif ($scope eq "match_ids") {
00723         my @setIDs = split /\s*,\s*/, $actionParams->{"action.filter.set_ids"}->[0];
00724         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = \@setIDs;
00725     } elsif ($scope eq "match_open_date") {
00726         my $open_date = $actionParams->{"action.filter.open_date"}->[0];
00727         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $self->{open_dates}->{$open_date}; # an arrayref
00728     } elsif ($scope eq "match_due_date") {
00729         my $due_date = $actionParams->{"action.filter.due_date"}->[0];
00730         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $self->{due_date}->{$due_date}; # an arrayref
00731     } elsif ($scope eq "match_answer_date") {
00732         my $answer_date = $actionParams->{"action.filter.answer_date"}->[0];
00733         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $self->{answer_dates}->{$answer_date}; # an arrayref
00734     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
00735         # DBFIXME do filtering in the database, please!
00736         my @setRecords = $db->getGlobalSets(@{$self->{allSetIDs}});
00737         my @visibleSetIDs = map { $_->visible ? $_->set_id : ""} @setRecords;       
00738         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = \@visibleSetIDs;
00739     } elsif ($scope eq "unvisible") {
00740         # DBFIXME do filtering in the database, please!
00741         my @setRecords = $db->getGlobalSets(@{$self->{allSetIDs}});
00742         my @unvisibleSetIDs = map { (not $_->visible) ? $_->set_id : ""} @setRecords;
00743         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = \@unvisibleSetIDs;
00744     }
00745     
00746     return $result;
00747 }

00788 sub sort_handler {

00793     
00794     $self->{primarySortField} = $primary;
00795     $self->{secondarySortField} = $secondary;
00796 
00797     my %names = (
00798         set_id      => "Set Name",
00799         set_header  => "Set Header",
00800         hardcopy_header => "Hardcopy Header",
00801         open_date   => "Open Date",

00804         visible => "Visibility",
00805     );
00806     
00807     return "sort by $names{$primary} and then by $names{$secondary}.";

00830 sub edit_handler {
00831     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
00832 
00833     my $result;
00834     
00835     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.edit.scope"}->[0];
00836     if ($scope eq "all") {
00837         $result = "editing all sets";
00838         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $self->{allSetIDs};
00839     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
00840         $result = "editing visible sets";
00841         # leave visibleUserIDs alone
00842     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00843         $result = "editing selected sets";
00844         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $genericParams->{selected_sets}; # an arrayref
00845     }
00846     $self->{editMode} = 1;
00847     
00848     return $result;
00849 }

00881 
00882 sub publish_handler {
00883     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
00884 
00885     my $r = $self->r;
00886     my $db = $r->db;
00887 
00888     my $result = "";
00889     
00890     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.publish.scope"}->[0];
00891     my $value = $actionParams->{"action.publish.value"}->[0];
00892 
00893     my $verb = $value ? "made visible for" : "hidden from";
00894     
00895     my @setIDs;
00896     
00897     if ($scope eq "none") { # FIXME: double negative "Make no sets hidden" might make professor expect all sets to be made visible.
00898         @setIDs = ();
00899         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},"No change made to any set.");
00900     } elsif ($scope eq "all") {
00901         @setIDs = @{ $self->{allSetIDs} };
00902         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"All sets $verb all students.");
00903     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
00904         @setIDs = @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} };
00905         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"All visible sets $verb all students.");
00906     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00907         @setIDs = @{ $genericParams->{selected_sets} };
00908         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"All selected sets $verb all students.");
00909     }
00910     
00911     # can we use UPDATE here, instead of fetch/change/store?
00912     my @sets = $db->getGlobalSets(@setIDs);
00913     
00914     map { $_->visible("$value") if $_; $db->putGlobalSet($_); } @sets;
00915     
00916     return $result
00917     
00918 }

00950 sub enable_reduced_scoring_handler {
00951     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
00952 
00953     my $r = $self->r;
00954     my $db = $r->db;
00955 
00956     my $result = "";
00957     
00958     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.enable_reduced_scoring.scope"}->[0];
00959     my $value = $actionParams->{"action.enable_reduced_scoring.value"}->[0];
00960 
00961     my $verb = $value ? "enabled" : "disabled";
00962     
00963     my @setIDs;
00964     
00965     if ($scope eq "none") { # FIXME: double negative "Make no sets hidden" might make professor expect all sets to be made visible.
00966         @setIDs = ();
00967         $result =  CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "No change made to any set.");
00968     } elsif ($scope eq "all") {
00969         @setIDs = @{ $self->{allSetIDs} };
00970         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"Reduced Credit $verb for all sets.");
00971     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
00972         @setIDs = @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} };
00973         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"Reduced Credit $verb for visable sets.");
00974     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00975         @setIDs = @{ $genericParams->{selected_sets} };
00976         $result = CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"Reduced Credit $verb for selected sets.");
00977     }
00978     
00979     # can we use UPDATE here, instead of fetch/change/store?
00980     my @sets = $db->getGlobalSets(@setIDs);
00981     
00982     map { $_->enable_reduced_scoring("$value") if $_; $db->putGlobalSet($_); } @sets;
00983     
00984     return $result
00985     
00986 }

01010 sub score_handler {
01011     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01012 
01013     my $r      = $self->r;
01014     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01015     my $courseName = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
01016 
01017     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.score.scope"}->[0]; 
01018     my @setsToScore;
01019     
01020     if ($scope eq "none") { 
01021         @setsToScore = ();
01022         return "No sets selected for scoring.";
01023     } elsif ($scope eq "all") {
01024         @setsToScore = @{ $self->{allSetIDs} };
01025     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
01026         @setsToScore = @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} };
01027     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
01028         @setsToScore = @{ $genericParams->{selected_sets} };
01029     }
01030 
01031     my $uri = $self->systemLink( $urlpath->newFromModule('WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Scoring',$r, courseID=>$courseName),
01032                     params=>{
01033                         scoreSelected=>"Score Selected",
01034                         selectedSet=>\@setsToScore,
01035 #                       recordSingleSetScores=>''
01036                     }
01037     );
01038     
01039     
01040     return $uri;
01041 }

01048         CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
01049             "Delete ",
01050             CGI::popup_menu(
01051                 -name => "action.delete.scope",
01052                 -values => [qw(none selected)],
01053                 -default => "none", #  don't make it easy to delete # $actionParams{"action.delete.scope"}->[0] || "none",
01054                 -labels => {
01055                     none => "no sets.",
01056                     #visible => "visible sets.",
01057                     selected => "selected sets.",
01058                 },

01065 
01066 sub delete_handler {
01067     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01068 
01069     my $r      = $self->r;
01070     my $db     = $r->db;
01071 
01072     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.delete.scope"}->[0];
01073 
01074     
01075     my @setIDsToDelete = ();
01076 
01077     if ($scope eq "selected") {
01078         @setIDsToDelete = @{ $self->{selectedSetIDs} };
01079     }
01080     
01081     my %allSetIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{allSetIDs} };
01082     my %visibleSetIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} };
01083     my %selectedSetIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{selectedSetIDs} };
01084 
01085     foreach my $setID (@setIDsToDelete) {
01086         delete $allSetIDs{$setID};
01087         delete $visibleSetIDs{$setID};
01088         delete $selectedSetIDs{$setID};
01089         $db->deleteGlobalSet($setID);
01090     }
01091     
01092     $self->{allSetIDs} = [ keys %allSetIDs ];
01093     $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [ keys %visibleSetIDs ];
01094     $self->{selectedSetIDs} = [ keys %selectedSetIDs ];
01095     
01096     my $num = @setIDsToDelete;
01097      return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},  "deleted $num set" .
01098                                                ($num == 1 ? "" : "s")
01099     );
01100 }
01101 
01102 sub create_form {
01103     my ($self, $onChange, %actionParams) = @_;
01104 
01105     my $r      = $self->r;

01107     return "Create a new set named: ", 
01108         CGI::textfield(
01109             -name => "action.create.name",
01110             -value => $actionParams{"action.create.name"}->[0] || "",
01111             -width => "50",
01112             -onchange => $onChange,
01113         ),
01114         " as ",
01115         CGI::popup_menu(
01116             -name => "action.create.type",
01117             -values => [qw(empty copy)],
01118             -default => $actionParams{"action.create.type"}->[0] || "empty",
01119             -labels => {
01120                 empty => "a new empty set.",
01121                 copy => "a duplicate of the first selected set.",
01122             },
01123             -onchange => $onChange,
01124         );
01125             
01126 }
01127 
01128 sub create_handler {
01129     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01130 
01131     my $r      = $self->r;
01132     my $db     = $r->db;
01133     
01134     my $newSetID = $actionParams->{"action.create.name"}->[0];
01135     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to create new set: no set name specified!") unless $newSetID =~ /\S/;
01136     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Set $newSetID exists.  No set created") if $db->existsGlobalSet($newSetID);
01137     my $newSetRecord = $db->newGlobalSet;
01138     my $oldSetID = $self->{selectedSetIDs}->[0];
01139 
01140     my $type = $actionParams->{"action.create.type"}->[0];
01141     # It's convenient to set the open date one week from now so that it is 
01142     # not accidentally available to students.  We set the due and answer date
01143     # to be two weeks from now.
01144 
01145 
01146     if ($type eq "empty") {
01147         $newSetRecord->set_id($newSetID);
01148         $newSetRecord->set_header("defaultHeader");
01149         $newSetRecord->hardcopy_header("defaultHeader");
01150         $newSetRecord->open_date(time + ONE_WEEK());
01151         $newSetRecord->due_date(time + 2*ONE_WEEK() );
01152         $newSetRecord->answer_date(time + 2*ONE_WEEK() );
01153         $newSetRecord->visible(DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_STATE()); # don't want students to see an empty set
01154         $newSetRecord->enable_reduced_scoring(DEFAULT_ENABLED_REDUCED_SCORING_STATE());
01155         $db->addGlobalSet($newSetRecord);
01156     } elsif ($type eq "copy") {
01157         return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to duplicate set: no set selected for duplication!") unless $oldSetID =~ /\S/;
01158         $newSetRecord = $db->getGlobalSet($oldSetID);
01159         $newSetRecord->set_id($newSetID);
01160         $db->addGlobalSet($newSetRecord);
01161 
01162         # take all the problems from the old set and make them part of the new set
01163         foreach ($db->getAllGlobalProblems($oldSetID)) { 
01164             $_->set_id($newSetID); 
01165             $db->addGlobalProblem($_);
01166         }
01167 
01168         # also copy any set_location restrictions and set-level proctor
01169         #    information
01170         foreach ($db->getAllGlobalSetLocations($oldSetID)) {
01171             $_->set_id($newSetID);
01172             $db->addGlobalSetLocation($_);
01173         }
01174         if ( $newSetRecord->restricted_login_proctor eq 'Yes' ) {
01175             my $procUser = $db->getUser("set_id:$oldSetID");
01176             $procUser->user_id("set_id:$newSetID");
01177             eval { $db->addUser( $procUser ) };
01178             if ( ! $@ ) {
01179                 my $procPerm = $db->getPermissionLevel("set_id:$oldSetID");
01180                 $procPerm->user_id("set_id:$newSetID");
01181                 $db->addPermissionLevel($procPerm);
01182                 my $procPass = $db->getPassword("set_id:$oldSetID");
01183                 $procPass->user_id("set_id:$newSetID");
01184                 $db->addPassword($procPass);
01185             }
01186         }
01187     }
01188     #  Assign set to current active user
01189      my $userName = $r->param('user'); # FIXME possible security risk
01190      $self->assignSetToUser($userName, $newSetRecord); # cures weird date error when no-one assigned to set
01191      $self->addgoodmessage("Set $newSetID was assigned to $userName."); # not currently used
01192 
01193     push @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} }, $newSetID;
01194     push @{ $self->{allSetIds} }, $newSetID;
01195     
01196     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to create new set: $@") if $@;
01197     
01198      return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},"Successfully created new set $newSetID" );
01199     
01200 }
01201 
01202 sub import_form {
01203     my ($self, $onChange, %actionParams) = @_;
01204     
01205     my $r = $self->r;
01206     my $authz = $r->authz;
01207     my $user = $r->param('user');
01208 
01209     # this will make the popup menu alternate between a single selection and a multiple selection menu
01210     # Note: search by name is required since document.problemsetlist.action.import.number is not seen as
01211     # a valid reference to the object named 'action.import.number'
01212     my $importScript = join (" ",
01213                 "var number = document.getElementsByName('action.import.number')[0].value;",
01214                 "document.getElementsByName('action.import.source')[0].size = number;",
01215                 "document.getElementsByName('action.import.source')[0].multiple = (number > 1 ? true : false);",
01216                 "document.getElementsByName('action.import.name')[0].value = (number > 1 ? '(taken from filenames)' : '');",
01217             );
01218     
01219     return join(" ",
01220         "Import ",
01221         CGI::popup_menu(
01222             -name => "action.import.number",
01223             -values => [ 1, 8 ],
01224             -default => $actionParams{"action.import.number"}->[0] || "1",
01225             -labels => {
01226                 1 => "a single set",
01227                 8 => "multiple sets",
01228             },
01229             -onchange => "$onChange;$importScript",
01230         ),
01231         " from ", # set definition file(s) ",
01232         CGI::popup_menu(
01233             -name => "action.import.source",
01234             -values => [ "", $self->getDefList() ],
01235             -labels => { "" => "the following file(s)" },
01236             -default => $actionParams{"action.import.source"}->[0] || "",
01237             -size => $actionParams{"action.import.number"}->[0] || "1",
01238             -onchange => $onChange,
01239         ),
01240         " with set name(s): ",
01241         CGI::textfield(
01242             -name => "action.import.name",
01243             -value => $actionParams{"action.import.name"}->[0] || "",
01244             -width => "50",
01245             -onchange => $onChange,
01246         ),
01247         ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets")) 
01248             ?
01249             "assigning this set to " .
01250             CGI::popup_menu(
01251                 -name => "action.import.assign",
01252                 -value => [qw(user all)],
01253                 -default => $actionParams{"action.import.assign"}->[0] || "user",
01254                 -labels => {
01255                     all => "all current users.",
01256                     user => "only $user.",
01257                 },
01258                 -onchange => $onChange,
01259             )
01260             :
01261             ""  #user does not have permissions to assign problem sets
01262     );
01263 }

01265 sub import_handler {
01266     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01267 
01268     my @fileNames = @{ $actionParams->{"action.import.source"} };
01269     my $newSetName = $actionParams->{"action.import.name"}->[0];
01270     $newSetName = "" if $actionParams->{"action.import.number"}->[0] > 1; # cannot assign set names to multiple imports
01271     my $assign = $actionParams->{"action.import.assign"}->[0];
01272     
01273     my ($added, $skipped) = $self->importSetsFromDef($newSetName, $assign, @fileNames);
01274 
01275     # make new sets visible... do we really want to do this? probably.
01276     push @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} }, @$added;
01277     push @{ $self->{allSetIDs} }, @$added;
01278     
01279     my $numAdded = @$added;
01280     my $numSkipped = @$skipped;
01281 
01282    return CGI::div(
01283         {class=>"ResultsWithoutError"}, 
01284         $numAdded . " set" . ($numAdded == 1 ? "" : "s") . " added, "
01285         . $numSkipped . " set" . ($numSkipped == 1 ? "" : "s") . " skipped"
01286         . " (" . join (", ", @$skipped) . ") "
01287     );
01288 }

01309 # this does not actually export any files, rather it sends us to a new page in order to export the files
01310 sub export_handler {
01311     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01312 
01313     my $result;
01314     
01315     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.export.scope"}->[0];
01316     if ($scope eq "all") {
01317         $result = "exporting all sets";
01318         $self->{selectedSetIDs} = $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $self->{allSetIDs};
01319 
01320     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
01321         $result = "exporting visible sets";
01322         $self->{selectedSetIDs} = $self->{visibleSetIDs};
01323     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
01324         $result = "exporting selected sets";
01325         $self->{selectedSetIDs} = $self->{visibleSetIDs} = $genericParams->{selected_sets}; # an arrayref
01326     }
01327     $self->{exportMode} = 1;
01328     
01329     return   CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},  $result);
01330 }

01344         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_sets") ];
01345     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visible_sets")) {
01346         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [];

01360 sub saveExport_handler {
01361     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01362     my $r           = $self->r;
01363     my $db          = $r->db;
01364     
01365     my @setIDsToExport = @{ $self->{selectedSetIDs} };
01366 
01367     my %filenames = map { $_ => (@{ $tableParams->{"set.$_"} }[0] || $_) } @setIDsToExport;
01368 
01369     my ($exported, $skipped, $reason) = $self->exportSetsToDef(%filenames);
01370     
01371     if (defined $r->param("prev_visible_sets")) {
01372         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_sets") ];
01373     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visble_sets")) {
01374         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [];
01375     } else {
01376         # leave it alone
01377     }
01378     
01379     $self->{exportMode} = 0;
01380     
01381     my $numExported = @$exported;
01382     my $numSkipped = @$skipped;
01383     my $resultFont = ($numSkipped)? "ResultsWithError" : "ResultsWithoutError";
01384     
01385     my @reasons = map { "set $_ - " . $reason->{$_} } keys %$reason;
01386 
01387     return  CGI::div( {class=>$resultFont},
01388         $numExported . " set" . ($numExported == 1 ? "" : "s") . " exported, "
01389         . $numSkipped . " set" . ($numSkipped == 1 ? "" : "s") . " skipped."
01390         . (($numSkipped) ? CGI::ul(CGI::li(\@reasons)) : "")
01391         );
01392 
01393 }

01423 sub saveEdit_handler {
01424     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01425     my $r           = $self->r;
01426     my $db          = $r->db;
01427     
01428     my @visibleSetIDs = @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} };
01429     foreach my $setID (@visibleSetIDs) {
01430         my $Set = $db->getGlobalSet($setID); # checked
01431         # FIXME: we may not want to die on bad sets, they're not as bad as bad users
01432         die "record for visible set $setID not found" unless $Set;
01433 
01434         foreach my $field ($Set->NONKEYFIELDS()) {
01435             my $param = "set.${setID}.${field}";
01436             if (defined $tableParams->{$param}->[0]) {
01437                 if ($field =~ /_date/) {
01438                     $Set->$field($self->parseDateTime($tableParams->{$param}->[0]));
01439                 } else {
01440                     $Set->$field($tableParams->{$param}->[0]);
01441                 }
01442             }
01443         }
01444         
01445         # make sure the dates are not more than 10 years in the future
01446         my $curr_time = time;
01447         my $seconds_per_year = 31_556_926;
01448         my $cutoff = $curr_time + $seconds_per_year*10;
01449         return CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "Error: open date cannot be more than 10 years from now in set $setID")
01450             if $Set->open_date > $cutoff;
01451         return CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "Error: due date cannot be more than 10 years from now in set $setID")
01452             if $Set->due_date > $cutoff;
01453         return CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "Error: answer date cannot be more than 10 years from now in set $setID")
01454             if $Set->answer_date > $cutoff;
01455         
01456         # Check that the open, due and answer dates are in increasing order.
01457         # Bail if this is not correct.
01458         if ($Set->open_date > $Set->due_date)  {
01459             return CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "Error: Due date must come after open date in set $setID");
01460         }
01461         if ($Set->due_date > $Set->answer_date) {
01462             return CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "Error: Answer date must come after due date in set $setID");
01463         }
01464         
01465         $db->putGlobalSet($Set);
01466     }
01467     
01468     if (defined $r->param("prev_visible_sets")) {
01469         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_sets") ];
01470     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visble_sets")) {
01471         $self->{visibleSetIDs} = [];
01472     } else {
01473         # leave it alone
01474     }
01475     
01476     $self->{editMode} = 0;
01477     
01478     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "changes saved" );
01479 }
01480

01486 
01487     return "" unless @visible_sets == 1;
01488     
01489     return join ("", 
01490         "Duplicate this set and name it: ", 
01491         CGI::textfield(
01492             -name => "action.duplicate.name",

01494             -width => "50",
