01499 
01500 sub duplicate_handler {
01501     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01502     
01503     my $r = $self->r;
01504     my $db = $r->db;
01505     
01506     my $oldSetID = $self->{selectedSetIDs}->[0];
01507     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to duplicate set: no set selected for duplication!") unless defined($oldSetID) and $oldSetID =~ /\S/;    
01508     my $newSetID = $actionParams->{"action.duplicate.name"}->[0];
01509     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to duplicate set: no set name specified!") unless $newSetID =~ /\S/;     
01510     # DBFIXME checking for existence -- don't need to fetch
01511     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to duplicate set: set $newSetID already exists!") if defined $db->getGlobalSet($newSetID);
01512 
01513     my $newSet = $db->getGlobalSet($oldSetID);
01514     $newSet->set_id($newSetID);
01515     eval {$db->addGlobalSet($newSet)};
01516     
01517     # take all the problems from the old set and make them part of the new set
01518     foreach ($db->getAllGlobalProblems($oldSetID)) { 
01519         $_->set_id($newSetID); 
01520         $db->addGlobalProblem($_);
01521     }
01522     
01523     push @{ $self->{visibleSetIDs} }, $newSetID;
01524 
01525     return CGI::div({class => "ResultsWithError"}, "Failed to duplicate set: $@") if $@;
01526     
01527     return "SUCCESS";
01528 }
01529 
01530 ################################################################################
01531 # sorts
01532 ################################################################################
01533 
01534 sub bySetID         { $a->set_id         cmp $b->set_id         }
01535 
01536 # I can't figure out why these are useful
01537 
01538 # sub bySetHeader     { $a->set_header     cmp $b->set_header     }
01539 # sub byHardcopyHeader { $a->hardcopy_header cmp $b->hardcopy_header }
01540 #FIXME  eventually we may be able to remove these checks, if we can trust 
01541 # that the dates are always defined
01542 # dates which are the empty string '' or undefined  are treated as 0
01543 sub byOpenDate      { my $result = eval{( $a->open_date || 0 )      <=> ( $b->open_date || 0 ) };
01544                       return $result unless $@;
01545                       warn "Open date not correctly defined.";
01546                       return 0;
01547 }
01548 sub byDueDate       { my $result = eval{( $a->due_date || 0 )     <=> ( $b->due_date || 0 )   };      
01549                       return $result unless $@;
01550                       warn "Due date not correctly defined.";
01551                       return 0;
01552 }
01553 sub byAnswerDate    { my $result = eval{( $a->answer_date || 0)    <=> ( $b->answer_date || 0 )  };    
01554                       return $result unless $@;
01555                       warn "Answer date not correctly defined.";
01556                       return 0;
01557 }
01558 sub byVisible     { my $result = eval{$a->visible      cmp $b->visible   };      
01559                       return $result unless $@;
01560                       warn "Visibility status not correctly defined.";
01561                       return 0;
01562 }
01563 
01564 sub byOpenDue       { &byOpenDate || &byDueDate }
01565 
01566 ################################################################################
01567 # utilities
01568 ################################################################################
01569 
01570 # generate labels for open_date/due_date/answer_date popup menus
01571 sub menuLabels {
01572     my ($self, $hashRef) = @_;
01573     my %hash = %$hashRef;
01574     
01575     my %result;
01576     foreach my $key (keys %hash) {
01577         my $count = @{ $hash{$key} };
01578         my $displayKey = $self->formatDateTime($key) || "<none>";
01579         $result{$key} = "$displayKey ($count sets)";
01580     }
01581     return %result;
01582 }
01583 
01584 sub importSetsFromDef {
01585     my ($self, $newSetName, $assign, @setDefFiles) = @_;
01586     my $r     = $self->r;
01587     my $ce    = $r->ce;
01588     my $db    = $r->db;
01589     my $dir   = $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates};
01590 
01591     # if the user includes "following files" in a multiple selection
01592     # it shows up here as "" which causes the importing to die
01593     # so, we select on filenames containing non-whitespace
01594     @setDefFiles = grep(/\S/, @setDefFiles);
01595 
01596     # FIXME: do we really want everything to fail on one bad file name?
01597     foreach my $fileName (@setDefFiles) {
01598         die "won't be able to read from file $dir/$fileName: does it exist? is it readable?"
01599             unless -r "$dir/$fileName";
01600     }
01601 
01602     my @allSetIDs = $db->listGlobalSets();
01603     # FIXME: getGlobalSets takes a lot of time just for checking to see if a set already exists
01604     #   this could be avoided by waiting until the call to addGlobalSet below
01605     #   and checking to see if the error message says that the set already exists
01606     #   but if the error message is ever changed the code here might be broken
01607     #   then again, one call to getGlobalSets and skipping unnecessary calls to addGlobalSet
01608     #   could be faster than no call to getGlobalSets and lots of unnecessary calls to addGlobalSet
01609     # DBFIXME all we need here is set IDs, right? why fetch entire records?
01610     my %allSets = map { $_->set_id => 1 if $_} $db->getGlobalSets(@allSetIDs); # checked
01611 
01612     my (@added, @skipped);
01613 
01614     foreach my $set_definition_file (@setDefFiles) {
01615 
01616         debug("$set_definition_file: reading set definition file");
01617         # read data in set definition file
01618         my ($setName, $paperHeaderFile, $screenHeaderFile, $openDate, $dueDate, $answerDate, $ra_problemData, $assignmentType, $attemptsPerVersion, $timeInterval, $versionsPerInterval, $versionTimeLimit, $problemRandOrder, $problemsPerPage, $hideScore, $hideWork,$timeCap,$restrictIP,$restrictLoc,$relaxRestrictIP) = $self->readSetDef($set_definition_file);
01619         my @problemList = @{$ra_problemData};
01620 
01621         # Use the original name if form doesn't specify a new one.
01622         # The set acquires the new name specified by the form.  A blank
01623         # entry on the form indicates that the imported set name will be used.
01624         $setName = $newSetName if $newSetName;
01625 
01626         if ($allSets{$setName}) {
01627             # this set already exists!!
01628             push @skipped, $setName;
01629             next;
01630         } else {
01631             push @added, $setName;
01632         }
01633 
01634         debug("$set_definition_file: adding set");
01635         # add the data to the set record
01636         my $newSetRecord = $db->newGlobalSet;
01637         $newSetRecord->set_id($setName);
01638         $newSetRecord->set_header($screenHeaderFile);
01639         $newSetRecord->hardcopy_header($paperHeaderFile);
01640         $newSetRecord->open_date($openDate);
01641         $newSetRecord->due_date($dueDate);
01642         $newSetRecord->answer_date($answerDate);
01643         $newSetRecord->visible(DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_STATE);
01644         $newSetRecord->enable_reduced_scoring(DEFAULT_ENABLED_REDUCED_SCORING_STATE);
01645 
01646     # gateway/version data.  these should are all initialized to ''
01647         #   by readSetDef, so for non-gateway/versioned sets they'll just 
01648         #   be stored as null
01649         $newSetRecord->assignment_type($assignmentType);
01650         $newSetRecord->attempts_per_version($attemptsPerVersion);
01651         $newSetRecord->time_interval($timeInterval);
01652         $newSetRecord->versions_per_interval($versionsPerInterval);
01653         $newSetRecord->version_time_limit($versionTimeLimit);
01654         $newSetRecord->problem_randorder($problemRandOrder);
01655         $newSetRecord->problems_per_page($problemsPerPage);
01656         $newSetRecord->hide_score($hideScore);
01657         $newSetRecord->hide_work($hideWork);
01658         $newSetRecord->time_limit_cap($timeCap);
01659         $newSetRecord->restrict_ip($restrictIP);
01660         $newSetRecord->relax_restrict_ip($relaxRestrictIP);
01661 
01662         #create the set
01663         eval {$db->addGlobalSet($newSetRecord)};
01664         die "addGlobalSet $setName in ProblemSetList:  $@" if $@;
01665 
01666         #do we need to add locations to the set_locations table?
01667         if ( $restrictIP ne 'No' && $restrictLoc ) {
01668             if ($db->existsLocation( $restrictLoc ) ) {
01669                 if ( ! $db->existsGlobalSetLocation($setName,$restrictLoc) ) {
01670                     my $newSetLocation = $db->newGlobalSetLocation;
01671                     $newSetLocation->set_id( $setName );
01672                     $newSetLocation->location_id( $restrictLoc );
01673                     eval {$db->addGlobalSetLocation($newSetLocation)};
01674                     warn("error adding set location $restrictLoc " .
01675                          "for set $setName: $@") if $@;
01676                 } else {
01677                     # this should never happen.
01678                     warn("input set location $restrictLoc" .
01679                          " already exists for set " . 
01680                          "$setName.\n");
01681                 }
01682             } else { 
01683                 warn("restriction location $restrictLoc " .
01684                      "does not exist.  IP restrictions have " .
01685                      "been ignored.\n");
01686                 $newSetRecord->restrict_ip('No');
01687                 $newSetRecord->relax_restrict_ip('No');
01688                 eval { $db->putGlobalSet($newSetRecord) };
01689                 # we ignore error messages here; if the set
01690                 #    added without error before, we assume 
01691                 #    (ha) that it will put without trouble
01692             }
01693         }
01694 
01695         debug("$set_definition_file: adding problems to database");
01696         # add problems
01697         my $freeProblemID = WeBWorK::Utils::max($db->listGlobalProblems($setName)) + 1;
01698         foreach my $rh_problem (@problemList) {
01699             $self->addProblemToSet(
01700               setName => $setName,
01701               sourceFile => $rh_problem->{source_file},
01702               problemID => $freeProblemID++,
01703               value => $rh_problem->{value},
01704               maxAttempts => $rh_problem->{max_attempts});
01705         }
01706 
01707 
01708         if ($assign eq "all") {
01709             $self->assignSetToAllUsers($setName);
01710         }
01711         else {
01712             my $userName = $r->param('user');
01713             $self->assignSetToUser($userName, $newSetRecord); ## always assign set to instructor
01714         }
01715     }
01716 
01717     return \@added, \@skipped;
01718 }
01719 
01720 sub readSetDef {
01721     my ($self, $fileName) = @_;
01722     my $templateDir   = $self->{ce}->{courseDirs}->{templates};
01723     my $filePath      = "$templateDir/$fileName";
01724     my $value_default = $self->{ce}->{problemDefaults}->{value};
01725     my $max_attempts_default = $self->{ce}->{problemDefaults}->{max_attempts};
01726 
01727     my $setName = '';
01728 
01729     if ($fileName =~ m|^set([.\w-]+)\.def$|) {
01730         $setName = $1;
01731     } else {
01732         $self->addbadmessage( 
01733             qq{The setDefinition file name must begin with   <CODE>set</CODE>},
01734             qq{and must end with   <CODE>.def</CODE>  . Every thing in between becomes the name of the set. },
01735             qq{For example <CODE>set1.def</CODE>, <CODE>setExam.def</CODE>, and <CODE>setsample7.def</CODE> },
01736             qq{define sets named <CODE>1</CODE>, <CODE>Exam</CODE>, and <CODE>sample7</CODE> respectively. },
01737             qq{The filename, $fileName, you entered is not legal\n } 
01738         );
01739 
01740     }
01741 
01742     my ($line, $name, $value, $attemptLimit, $continueFlag);
01743     my $paperHeaderFile = '';
01744     my $screenHeaderFile = '';
01745     my ($dueDate, $openDate, $answerDate);
01746     my @problemData;    
01747 
01748 # added fields for gateway test/versioned set definitions:
01749     my ( $assignmentType, $attemptsPerVersion, $timeInterval, 
01750          $versionsPerInterval, $versionTimeLimit, $problemRandOrder,
01751          $problemsPerPage, $restrictLoc,
01752          ) = 
01753          ('')x8;  # initialize these to ''
01754     my ( $timeCap, $restrictIP, $relaxRestrictIP ) = ( 0, 'No', 'No');
01755 # additional fields currently used only by gateways; later, the world?
01756     my ( $hideScore, $hideWork, ) = ( 'N', 'N' );
01757 
01758     my %setInfo;
01759     if ( open (SETFILENAME, "$filePath") )    {
01760     #####################################################################
01761     # Read and check set data
01762     #####################################################################
01763         while (<SETFILENAME>) {
01764         
01765             chomp($line = $_);
01766             $line =~ s|(#.*)||;                              ## don't read past comments
01767             unless ($line =~ /\S/) {next;}                   ## skip blank lines
01768             $line =~ s|\s*$||;                               ## trim trailing spaces
01769             $line =~ m|^\s*(\w+)\s*=\s*(.*)|;
01770             
01771             ######################
01772             # sanity check entries
01773             ######################
01774             my $item = $1;
01775             $item    = '' unless defined $item;
01776             my $value = $2;
01777             $value    = '' unless defined $value;
01778             
01779             if ($item eq 'setNumber') {
01780                 next;
01781             } elsif ($item eq 'paperHeaderFile') {
01782                 $paperHeaderFile = $value;
01783             } elsif ($item eq 'screenHeaderFile') {
01784                 $screenHeaderFile = $value;
01785             } elsif ($item eq 'dueDate') {
01786                 $dueDate = $value;
01787             } elsif ($item eq 'openDate') {
01788                 $openDate = $value;
01789             } elsif ($item eq 'answerDate') {
01790                 $answerDate = $value;
01791             } elsif ($item eq 'assignmentType') {
01792                 $assignmentType = $value;
01793             } elsif ($item eq 'attemptsPerVersion') {
01794                 $attemptsPerVersion = $value;
01795             } elsif ($item eq 'timeInterval') {
01796                 $timeInterval = $value;
01797             } elsif ($item eq 'versionsPerInterval') {
01798                 $versionsPerInterval = $value;
01799             } elsif ($item eq 'versionTimeLimit') {
01800                 $versionTimeLimit = $value;
01801             } elsif ($item eq 'problemRandOrder') {
01802                 $problemRandOrder = $value;
01803             } elsif ($item eq 'problemsPerPage') {
01804                 $problemsPerPage = $value;
01805             } elsif ($item eq 'hideScore') {
01806                 $hideScore = ( $value ) ? $value : 'N';
01807             } elsif ($item eq 'hideWork') {
01808                 $hideWork = ( $value ) ? $value : 'N';
01809             } elsif ($item eq 'capTimeLimit') {
01810                 $timeCap = ( $value ) ? 1 : 0;
01811             } elsif ($item eq 'restrictIP') {
01812                 $restrictIP = ( $value ) ? $value : 'No';
01813             } elsif ($item eq 'restrictLocation' ) { 
01814                 $restrictLoc = ( $value ) ? $value : '';
01815             } elsif ( $item eq 'relaxRestrictIP' ) {
01816                 $relaxRestrictIP = ( $value ) ? $value : 'No';
01817             } elsif ($item eq 'problemList') {
01818                 last;
01819             } else {
01820                 warn "readSetDef error, can't read the line: ||$line||";
01821             }
01822         }
01823 
01824         #####################################################################
01825         # Check and format dates
01826         #####################################################################
01827         my ($time1, $time2, $time3) = map {  $self->parseDateTime($_);  }    ($openDate, $dueDate, $answerDate);
01828     
01829         unless ($time1 <= $time2 and $time2 <= $time3) {
01830             warn "The open date: $openDate, due date: $dueDate, and answer date: $answerDate must be defined and in chronological order.";
01831         }
01832 
01833         # Check header file names
01834         $paperHeaderFile =~ s/(.*?)\s*$/$1/;   #remove trailing white space
01835         $screenHeaderFile =~ s/(.*?)\s*$/$1/;   #remove trailing white space
01836     
01837                 #####################################################################
01838                 # Gateway/version variable cleanup: convert times into seconds
01839         $timeInterval = WeBWorK::Utils::timeToSec( $timeInterval )
01840             if ( $timeInterval );
01841         $versionTimeLimit = WeBWorK::Utils::timeToSec($versionTimeLimit)
01842             if ( $versionTimeLimit );
01843 
01844         # check that the values for hideWork and hideScore are valid
01845         if ( $hideScore ne 'N' && $hideScore ne 'Y' && 
01846              $hideScore ne 'BeforeAnswerDate' ) {
01847             warn("The value $hideScore for the hideScore option " .
01848                  "is not valid; it will be replaced with 'N'.\n");
01849             $hideScore = 'N';
01850         }
01851         if ( $hideWork ne 'N' && $hideWork ne 'Y' && 
01852              $hideWork ne 'BeforeAnswerDate' ) {
01853             warn("The value $hideWork for the hideWork option " .
01854                  "is not valid; it will be replaced with 'N'.\n");
01855             $hideWork = 'N';
01856         }
01857         if ( $timeCap ne '0' && $timeCap ne '1' ) {
01858             warn("The value $timeCap for the capTimeLimit option " .
01859                  "is not valid; it will be replaced with '0'.\n");
01860             $timeCap = '0';
01861         }
01862         if ( $restrictIP ne 'No' && $restrictIP ne 'DenyFrom' &&
01863              $restrictIP ne 'RestrictTo' ) {
01864             warn("The value $restrictIP for the restrictIP " .
01865                  "option is not valid; it will be replaced " . 
01866                  "with 'No'.\n");
01867             $restrictIP = 'No';
01868             $restrictLoc = '';
01869             $relaxRestrictIP = 'No';
01870         }
01871         if ( $relaxRestrictIP ne 'No' && 
01872              $relaxRestrictIP ne 'AfterAnswerDate' &&
01873              $relaxRestrictIP ne 'AfterVersionAnswerDate' ) {
01874             warn("The value $relaxRestrictIP for the " .
01875                  "relaxRestrictIP option is not valid; it will " . 
01876                  "be replaced with 'No'.\n");
01877             $relaxRestrictIP = 'No';
01878         }
01879         # to verify that restrictLoc is valid requires a database
01880         #    call, so we defer that until we return to add the set
01881         
01882         #####################################################################
01883         # Read and check list of problems for the set
01884         #####################################################################
01885         while(<SETFILENAME>) {
01886             chomp($line=$_);
01887             $line =~ s/(#.*)//;                             ## don't read past comments
01888             unless ($line =~ /\S/) {next;}                  ## skip blank lines
01889     
01890             # commas are valid in filenames, so we have to handle commas
01891             # using backslash escaping, so \X will be replaced with X
01892             my @line = ();
01893             my $curr = '';
01894             for (my $i = 0; $i < length $line; $i++) {
01895                 my $c = substr($line,$i,1);
01896                 if ($c eq '\\') {
01897                     $curr .= substr($line,++$i,1);
01898                 } elsif ($c eq ',') {
01899                     push @line, $curr;
01900                     $curr = '';
01901                 } else {
01902                     $curr .= $c;
01903                 }
01904             }
01905             ## anything left?
01906             push(@line, $curr) if ( $curr );
01907             
01908             ($name, $value, $attemptLimit, $continueFlag) = @line;
01909             #####################
01910             #  clean up problem values
01911             ###########################
01912             $name =~ s/\s*//g;
01913             $value = "" unless defined($value);
01914             $value =~ s/[^\d\.]*//g;
01915             unless ($value =~ /\d+/) {$value = $value_default;}
01916             $attemptLimit = "" unless defined($attemptLimit);
01917             $attemptLimit =~ s/[^\d-]*//g;
01918             unless ($attemptLimit =~ /\d+/) {$attemptLimit = $max_attempts_default;}
01919             $continueFlag = "0" unless( defined($continueFlag) && @problemData );  
01920             # can't put continuation flag onto the first problem
01921             push(@problemData, {source_file    => $name,
01922                                 value          =>  $value,
01923                                 max_attempts   =>, $attemptLimit,
01924                                 continuation   => $continueFlag 
01925                                 });
01926         }
01927         close(SETFILENAME);
01928         ($setName,
01929          $paperHeaderFile,
01930          $screenHeaderFile,
01931          $time1,
01932          $time2,
01933          $time3,
01934          \@problemData,
01935          $assignmentType, $attemptsPerVersion, $timeInterval, 
01936          $versionsPerInterval, $versionTimeLimit, $problemRandOrder,
01937          $problemsPerPage, 
01938          $hideScore,
01939          $hideWork,
01940          $timeCap,
01941          $restrictIP,
01942          $restrictLoc,
01943          $relaxRestrictIP,
01944         );
01945     } else {
01946         warn "Can't open file $filePath\n";
01947     }
01948 }
01949 
01950 sub exportSetsToDef {
01951         my ($self, %filenames) = @_;
01952 
01953     my $r        = $self->r;
01954     my $ce       = $r->ce;
01955     my $db       = $r->db;
01956 
01957     my (@exported, @skipped, %reason);
01958 
01959 SET:    foreach my $set (keys %filenames) {
01960 
01961         my $fileName = $filenames{$set};
01962         $fileName .= ".def" unless $fileName =~ m/\.def$/;
01963         $fileName  = "set" . $fileName unless $fileName =~ m/^set/;
01964         # files can be exported to sub directories but not parent directories
01965         if ($fileName =~ /\.\./) {
01966             push @skipped, $set;
01967             $reason{$set} = "Illegal filename contains '..'";
01968             next SET;
01969         }
01970 
01971         my $setRecord = $db->getGlobalSet($set);
01972         unless (defined $setRecord) {
01973             push @skipped, $set;
01974             $reason{$set} = "No record found.";
01975             next SET;
01976         }
01977         my $filePath = $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates} . '/' . $fileName;
01978 
01979         # back up existing file
01980         if(-e $filePath) {
01981             rename($filePath, "$filePath.bak") or 
01982                 $reason{$set} = "Existing file $filePath could not be backed up and was lost.";
01983         }
01984         
01985         my $openDate     = $self->formatDateTime($setRecord->open_date);
01986         my $dueDate      = $self->formatDateTime($setRecord->due_date);
01987         my $answerDate   = $self->formatDateTime($setRecord->answer_date);
01988         my $setHeader    = $setRecord->set_header;
01989         my $paperHeader  = $setRecord->hardcopy_header;
01990         my @problemList = $db->listGlobalProblems($set);
01991 
01992         my $problemList  = '';
01993         foreach my $prob (sort {$a <=> $b} @problemList) {
01994             # DBFIXME use an iterator?
01995             my $problemRecord = $db->getGlobalProblem($set, $prob); # checked
01996             unless (defined $problemRecord) {
01997                 push @skipped, $set;
01998                 $reason{$set} = "No record found for problem $prob.";
01999                 next SET;
02000             }
02001             my $source_file   = $problemRecord->source_file();
02002             my $value         = $problemRecord->value();
02003             my $max_attempts  = $problemRecord->max_attempts();
02004             
02005             # backslash-escape commas in fields
02006             $source_file =~ s/([,\\])/\\$1/g;
02007             $value =~ s/([,\\])/\\$1/g;
02008             $max_attempts =~ s/([,\\])/\\$1/g;
02009             $problemList     .= "$source_file, $value, $max_attempts \n";
02010         }
02011 
02012         # gateway fields
02013         my $assignmentType = $setRecord->assignment_type;
02014         my $gwFields = '';
02015         if ( $assignmentType =~ /gateway/ ) {
02016             my $attemptsPerV = $setRecord->attempts_per_version;
02017             my $timeInterval = $setRecord->time_interval;
02018             my $vPerInterval = $setRecord->versions_per_interval;
02019             my $vTimeLimit   = $setRecord->version_time_limit;
02020             my $probRandom   = $setRecord->problem_randorder;
02021             my $probPerPage  = $setRecord->problems_per_page;
02022             my $hideScore    = $setRecord->hide_score;
02023             my $hideWork     = $setRecord->hide_work;
02024             my $timeCap      = $setRecord->time_limit_cap;
02025             $gwFields =<<EOG;
02026 
02027 assignmentType      = $assignmentType
02028 attemptsPerVersion  = $attemptsPerV
02029 timeInterval        = $timeInterval
02030 versionsPerInterval = $vPerInterval
02031 versionTimeLimit    = $vTimeLimit
02032 problemRandOrder    = $probRandom
02033 problemsPerPage     = $probPerPage
02034 hideScore           = $hideScore
02035 hideWork            = $hideWork
02036 capTimeLimit        = $timeCap
02037 EOG
02038             chomp($gwFields);
02039         }
02040 
02041         # ip restriction fields
02042         my $restrictIP = $setRecord->restrict_ip;
02043         my $restrictFields = '';
02044         if ( $restrictIP && $restrictIP ne 'No' ) {
02045             # only store the first location
02046             my $restrictLoc = ($db->listGlobalSetLocations($setRecord->set_id))[0];
02047             my $relaxRestrict = $setRecord->relax_restrict_ip;
02048             $restrictLoc || ($restrictLoc = '');
02049             $restrictFields = "restrictIP          = $restrictIP" .
02050                 "\nrestrictLocation    = $restrictLoc\n" . 
02051                 "relaxRestrictIP     = $relaxRestrict\n";
02052         }
02053 
02054         my $fileContents = <<EOF;
02055 
02056 openDate          = $openDate
02057 dueDate           = $dueDate
02058 answerDate        = $answerDate
02059 paperHeaderFile   = $paperHeader
02060 screenHeaderFile  = $setHeader$gwFields
02061 ${restrictFields}problemList       = 
02062 $problemList
02063 EOF
02064 
02065         $filePath = WeBWorK::Utils::surePathToFile($ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}, $filePath);
02066         eval {
02067             local *SETDEF;
02068             open SETDEF, ">$filePath" or die "Failed to open $filePath";
02069             print SETDEF $fileContents;
02070             close SETDEF;
02071         };
02072         
02073         if ($@) {
02074             push @skipped, $set;
02075             $reason{$set} = $@;
02076         } else {
02077             push @exported, $set;
02078         }
02079 
02080     }
02081     
02082     return \@exported, \@skipped, \%reason;
02083 
02084 }
02085 
02086 ################################################################################
02087 # "display" methods
02088 ################################################################################
02089 
02090 sub fieldEditHTML {
02091     my ($self, $fieldName, $value, $properties) = @_;
02092     my $size = $properties->{size};
02093     my $type = $properties->{type};
02094     my $access = $properties->{access};
02095     my $items = $properties->{items};
02096     my $synonyms = $properties->{synonyms};
02097     my $headerFiles = $self->{headerFiles};
02098     
02099     if ($access eq "readonly") {
02100         return $value;
02101     }
02102     
02103     if ($type eq "number" or $type eq "text") {
02104         return CGI::input({type=>"text", name=>$fieldName, value=>$value, size=>$size});
02105     }
02106     
02107     if ($type eq "filelist") {
02108         return CGI::popup_menu({
02109             name => $fieldName,
02110             value => [ sort keys %$headerFiles ],
02111             labels => $headerFiles,
02112             default => $value || 0,
02113         });
02114     }
02115 
02116     if ($type eq "enumerable") {
02117         my $matched = undef; # Whether a synonym match has occurred
02118 
02119         # Process synonyms for enumerable objects
02120         foreach my $synonym (keys %$synonyms) {
02121             if ($synonym ne "*" and $value =~ m/$synonym/) {
02122                 $value = $synonyms->{$synonym};
02123                 $matched = 1;
02124             }
02125         }
02126         
02127         if (!$matched and exists $synonyms->{"*"}) {
02128             $value = $synonyms->{"*"};
02129         }
02130         
02131         return CGI::popup_menu({
02132             name => $fieldName, 
02133             values => [keys %$items],
02134             default => $value,
02135             labels => $items,
02136         });
02137     }
02138     
02139     if ($type eq "checked") {
02140         
02141         # FIXME: kludge (R)
02142         # if the checkbox is checked it returns a 1, if it is unchecked it returns nothing
02143         # in which case the hidden field overrides the parameter with a 0
02144         return CGI::checkbox(
02145             -name => $fieldName,
02146             -checked => $value,
02147             -label => "",
02148             -value => 1
02149         ) . CGI::hidden(
02150             -name => $fieldName,
02151             -value => 0
02152         );
02153     }
02154 }
02155 
02156 sub recordEditHTML {
02157     my ($self, $Set, %options) = @_;
02158     my $r           = $self->r;
02159     my $urlpath     = $r->urlpath;
02160     my $ce          = $r->ce;
02161     my $db      = $r->db;
02162     my $authz   = $r->authz;
02163     my $user    = $r->param('user');
02164     my $root        = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
02165     my $courseName  = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
02166     
02167     my $editMode = $options{editMode};
02168     my $exportMode = $options{exportMode};
02169     my $setSelected = $options{setSelected};
02170 
02171     my $visibleClass = $Set->visible ? "visible" : "hidden";
02172     my $enable_reduced_scoringClass = $Set->enable_reduced_scoring ? 'Reduced Credit Enabled' : 'Reduced Credit Disabled';
02173 
02174     my $users = $db->countSetUsers($Set->set_id);
02175     my $totalUsers = $self->{totalUsers};
02176     # DBFIXME count would suffice
02177     my $problems = $db->listGlobalProblems($Set->set_id);
02178     
02179         my $usersAssignedToSetURL  = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_users_assigned_to_set', args=>{courseID => $courseName, setID => $Set->set_id} ));
02180     my $problemListURL  = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_set_detail', args=>{courseID => $courseName, setID => $Set->set_id} ));
02181     my $problemSetListURL = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_set_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName, setID => $Set->set_id})) . "&editMode=1&visible_sets=" . $Set->set_id;
02182     my $imageURL = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{htdocs}."/images/edit.gif";
02183         my $imageLink = CGI::a({href => $problemSetListURL}, CGI::img({src=>$imageURL, border=>0}));
02184     
02185     my @tableCells;
02186     my %fakeRecord;
02187     my $set_id = $Set->set_id;
02188 
02189     $fakeRecord{select} = CGI::checkbox(-name => "selected_sets", -value => $set_id, -checked => $setSelected, -label => "", );
02190 #   $fakeRecord{set_id} = CGI::font({class=>$visibleClass}, $set_id) . ($editMode ? "" : $imageLink);
02191     $fakeRecord{set_id} = $editMode 
02192                     ? CGI::a({href=>$problemListURL}, "$set_id") 
02193                     : CGI::font({class=>$visibleClass}, $set_id) . $imageLink;
02194     $fakeRecord{problems} = (FIELD_PERMS()->{problems} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, FIELD_PERMS()->{problems}))
02195                     ? "$problems"
02196                     : CGI::a({href=>$problemListURL}, "$problems");
02197     $fakeRecord{users} = (FIELD_PERMS()->{users} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, FIELD_PERMS()->{users}))
02198                     ? "$users/$totalUsers"
02199                     : CGI::a({href=>$usersAssignedToSetURL}, "$users/$totalUsers");
02200     $fakeRecord{filename} = CGI::input({-name => "set.$set_id", -value=>"set$set_id.def", -size=>60});
02201                     
02202         
02203     # Select
02204     if ($editMode) {
02205         # column not there
02206     } else {
02207         # selection checkbox
02208         push @tableCells, CGI::checkbox(
02209             -name => "selected_sets",
02210             -value => $set_id,
02211             -checked => $setSelected,
02212             -label => "",
02213         );
02214     }
02215     
02216     # Set ID
02217     if ($editMode) {
02218         push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$problemListURL}, "$set_id");
02219     } else {        
02220     push @tableCells, CGI::font({class=>$visibleClass}, $set_id . $imageLink);
02221     }
02222 
02223     # Problems link
02224     if ($editMode) {
02225         # column not there
02226     } else {
02227         # "problem list" link
02228         push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$problemListURL}, "$problems");
02229     }
02230     
02231     # Users link
02232     if ($editMode) {
02233         # column not there
02234     } else {
02235         # "edit users assigned to set" link
02236         push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$usersAssignedToSetURL}, "$users/$totalUsers");
02237     }
02238     
02239     # determine which non-key fields to show
02240     my @fieldsToShow;
02241     if ($editMode) {
02242         @fieldsToShow = @{ EDIT_FIELD_ORDER() };
02243     } elsif ($exportMode) {
02244         @fieldsToShow = @{ EXPORT_FIELD_ORDER() };
02245     } else {
02246         @fieldsToShow = @{ VIEW_FIELD_ORDER() };
02247     }
02248     
02249     # make a hash out of this so we can test membership easily
02250     my %nonkeyfields; @nonkeyfields{$Set->NONKEYFIELDS} = ();
02251     
02252     # Set Fields
02253     foreach my $field (@fieldsToShow) {
02254         next unless exists $nonkeyfields{$field};
02255         my $fieldName = "set." . $set_id . "." . $field,        
02256         my $fieldValue = $Set->$field;
02257         my %properties = %{ FIELD_PROPERTIES()->{$field} };
02258         $properties{access} = "readonly" unless $editMode;
02259         $fieldValue = $self->formatDateTime($fieldValue) if $field =~ /_date/;
02260         $fieldValue =~ s/ /&nbsp;/g unless $editMode;
02261         $fieldValue = ($fieldValue) ? "Yes" : "No" if $field =~ /visible/ and not $editMode;
02262         $fieldValue = ($fieldValue) ? "Yes" : "No" if $field =~ /enable_reduced_scoring/ and not $editMode;
02263         push @tableCells, CGI::font({class=>$visibleClass}, $self->fieldEditHTML($fieldName, $fieldValue, \%properties));
02264         #$fakeRecord{$field} = CGI::font({class=>$visibleClass}, $self->fieldEditHTML($fieldName, $fieldValue, \%properties));
02265     }
02266 
02267     #@tableCells = map { $fakeRecord{$_} } @fieldsToShow;
02268 
02269     return CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({}, \@tableCells));
02270 }
02271 
02272 sub printTableHTML {
02273     my ($self, $SetsRef, $fieldNamesRef, %options) = @_;
02274     my $r                       = $self->r;
02275     my $authz                   = $r->authz;
02276     my $user                    = $r->param('user');
02277     my $setTemplate             = $self->{setTemplate};
02278     my @Sets                    = @$SetsRef;
02279     my %fieldNames              = %$fieldNamesRef;
02280     
02281     my $editMode                = $options{editMode};
02282     my $exportMode              = $options{exportMode};
02283     my %selectedSetIDs          = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $options{selectedSetIDs} };
02284     my $currentSort             = $options{currentSort};
02285     
02286     # names of headings:
02287     my @realFieldNames = (
02288             $setTemplate->KEYFIELDS,
02289             $setTemplate->NONKEYFIELDS,
02290     );
02291 
02292     if ($editMode) {
02293         @realFieldNames = @{ EDIT_FIELD_ORDER() };
02294     } else {
02295         @realFieldNames = @{ VIEW_FIELD_ORDER() };
02296     }
02297     
02298     if ($exportMode) {
02299         @realFieldNames = @{ EXPORT_FIELD_ORDER() };
02300     }
02301 
02302     
02303     my %sortSubs = %{ SORT_SUBS() };
02304 
02305     # FIXME: should this always presume to use the templates directory?
02306     # (no, but that can wait until we have an abstract ProblemLibrary API -- sam)
02307     my $templates_dir = $r->ce->{courseDirs}->{templates};
02308     my $exempt_dirs = join "|", keys %{ $r->ce->{courseFiles}->{problibs} };
02309     my @headers = listFilesRecursive(
02310         $templates_dir,
02311         qr/header.*\.pg$/i, # match these files
02312         qr/^(?:$exempt_dirs|CVS)$/, # prune these directories
02313         0, # match against file name only
02314         1, # prune against path relative to $templates_dir
02315     );
02316     
02317     @headers = sort @headers;
02318     my %headers = map { $_ => $_ } @headers;
02319     $headers{""} = "Use System Default";
02320     $self->{headerFiles} = \%headers;   # store these header files so we don't have to look for them later.
02321 
02322 
02323     my @tableHeadings = map { $fieldNames{$_} } @realFieldNames;
02324     
02325     # prepend selection checkbox? only if we're NOT editing!
02326 #   unshift @tableHeadings, "Select", "Set", "Problems" unless $editMode;
02327 
02328     # print the table
02329     if ($editMode or $exportMode) {
02330         print CGI::start_table({});
02331     } else {
02332         print CGI::start_table({-border=>1});
02333     }
02334     
02335     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::th({}, \@tableHeadings));
02336     
02337 
02338     for (my $i = 0; $i < @Sets; $i++) {
02339         my $Set = $Sets[$i];
02340         
02341         print $self->recordEditHTML($Set,
02342             editMode => $editMode,
02343             exportMode => $exportMode,
02344             setSelected => exists $selectedSetIDs{$Set->set_id}
02345         );
02346     }
02347     
02348     print CGI::end_table();
02349     #########################################
02350     # if there are no users shown print message
02351     # 
02352     ##########################################
02353     
02354     print CGI::p(
02355                       CGI::i("No sets shown.  Choose one of the options above to list the sets in the course.")
02356     ) unless @Sets;
02357 }
02358 
02359 1;
